select seq, id, ref, step, depth, title, content, wdate, del, readcount from bbs
where title like concat('%', #{search}, '%') and del = 0
where content like concat('%', #{search}, '%') and del = 0
where id=#{search} and del = 0
order by ref desc, step asc limit ${(pageNumber*10)}, 10

select count(*) from bbs
where title like concat('%', #{search}, '%') and del = 0
where content like concat('%', #{search}, '%') and del = 0
where id=#{search} and del = 0
mapper.insert: insert into bbs(id, ref, step, depth, title, content, wdate, del, readcount) values(#{id}, (select ifnull(max(ref), 0)+1 from bbs b), 0, 0, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0, 0)
mapper.update: update bbs set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where seq=#{seq}
